is_team = #{isTeam,jdbcType=INTEGER},

ti.trade_id, ta.real_name tradeAssuredInsure_real_name, ta.identity_id tradeAssuredInsure_identity_id, ta.identity_name tradeAssuredInsure_identity_name, ta.identity_card tradeAssuredInsure_town, ta.address tradeAssuredInsure_address, ta.xq_bank_name tradeAssuredInsure_xq_bank_name, ta.xq_name tradeAssuredInsure_xq_name, ta.xq_bank_no tradeAssuredInsure_xq_bank_no, tradeAssuredIsurent_sex, tab.mobile_code tradeAssuredIsurent_mobile_code, tab.mail tradeAssuredIsurent_mail, tab.state tradeAssuredIsurent_state, tab.city tradeAssuredIsurent_city, tab.town tradeAssuredIsurent_town, tab.address tradeAssuredIsurent_address, tab.career_name tradeAssuredIsurent_career_name, tab.identity_stop_date tradeAssuredIsurent_identity_stop_date, tab.is_security tradeAssuredIsurent_is_security, tab.year_earnings tradeAssuredIsurent_year_earnings, tab.zipcode tradeAssuredIsurent_zipcode, tab.company_name tradeAssuredIsurent_company_name, tab.school_nature tradeAssuredIsurent_school_nature, tab.job1_name tradeAssuredIsurent_job1_name, tab.job2_name tradeAssuredIsurent_job2_name, tab.job3_name tradeAssuredIsurent_job3_name, tab.height tradeAssuredIsurent_height, tab.weight tradeAssuredIsurent_weight FROM t_c_trade_insure ti LEFT JOIN t_c_trade_assured ta ON ti.trade_id = ta.trade_id AND ta.flag = 1 LEFT JOIN t_c_trade_assured tab ON ti.trade_id = tab.trade_id AND tab.flag = 2 WHERE ti.status_id != 0 AND ti.trade_id = #{tradeId}

SELECT tab.mail mailPolicy, tab.real_name userName, ti.product_name productName FROM t_c_trade_insure ti LEFT JOIN t_c_trade_assured tab ON ti.order_id = tab.order_id AND tab.flag = 2 WHERE ti.fid = #{fid}

tradeAssuredIsurent_identity_id, tab.identity_name tradeAssuredIsurent_identity_name, tab.identity_card tradeAssuredIsurent_identity_card, tab.identity_card tradeAssuredIsurent_identity_card, tab.birthday tradeAssuredIsurent_birthday, tab.sex tradeAssuredIsurent_sex, tab.mobile_code tradeAssuredIsurent_mobile_code, tab.mail tradeAssuredIsurent_mail, tab.state tradeAssuredIsurent_state, tab.city tradeAssuredIsurent_city, tab.town tradeAssuredIsurent_town, tab.address tradeAssuredIsurent_address, tab.career_name tradeAssuredIsurent_career_name, tab.identity_stop_date tradeAssuredIsurent_identity_stop_date, tab.is_security tradeAssuredIsurent_is_security, tab.year_earnings tradeAssuredIsurent_year_earnings, tab.zipcode tradeAssuredIsurent_zipcode, tab.company_name tradeAssuredIsurent_company_name, tab.job3_name tradeAssuredIsurent_job3_name, tab.school_nature tradeAssuredIsurent_school_nature, tab.height tradeAssuredIsurent_height, tab.weight tradeAssuredIsurent_weight FROM t_c_trade_insure ti LEFT JOIN t_c_trade_assured ta ON ti.fid = ta.order_id AND ta.flag = 1 LEFT JOIN t_c_trade_assured tab ON ti.fid = tab.order_id AND tab.flag = 2 WHERE ti.status_id != 0 AND ti.member_id = #{memberId}
